label.popUpTitle: Dear Beneficiary, to access your details, I request you to enter your Aadhaar Number or PM KISAN Registration Number or Mobile Number.
label.popUpTitleValid: We kindly request you to provide us with your valid Aadhaar Number / PM KISAN ID / Phone no.
label.popUpTitle2: Enter your last 4 digits of Aadhaar
lable.noRecordsFound: No records were found for <user_identifier>, Please enter valid Mobile/Aadhaar/Benificiary Id again.
label.popUpTitle3: Dear Beneficiary, request you to kindly enter the one time password that has been received by you on your registered mobile number.
message.invalid_otp: Your entered One Time Password is wrong. Please enter the correct one. If you want me to re-send One Time Password, please click the below button.
message.invalid_question: Sorry, for such query, I am still working. You may try some other query (queries). I hope shortly I would be able to address all your concerns.
